DOC.brief_title: Association Study Evaluate TFPI Gene CAD Han Chinese
DOC.detailed_description: In study , CAD define one follow criterion : ( 1 ) base World Health Organization criterion term elevation cardiac enzyme , electrocardiography ( ECG ) clinical symptom ( angina , chest pressure , shortness breath ) ; ( 2 ) angiographic evidence 50 % stenosis one major coronary artery ; ( 3 ) previous history PCI ( percutaneous coronary intervention ) CABG ( coronary artery bypass graft ) . The control select two medical center meet follow criterion : ( 1 ) family history CAD ; ( 2 ) clinical symptom CAD ; ( 3 ) resting ECG show normal result . The subject two risk factor CAD ( age > 45 man > 55 woman , hypertension , diabetes , overweight , hyperlipidemia ) subject treadmill stress test select control ECG normal without clinical symptom . Those history cardiomyopathy , valvular disease , peripheral vascular disease , stroke , severe hepatic kidney deficiency exclude study . Venous blood collect standard vein puncture fast condition . Four single-nucleotide polymorphism ( SNPs ) ( rs7586970 , rs6434222 , rs10153820 rs8176528 ) detect polymerase chain reaction-direct sequencing method . And genotype SNPs determine CAD patient non-CAD control .
